title: China
heading: Data Collection & Field Services in China (Nationwide):
list: Coverage: Beijing + regional teams across Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Chengdu, Chongqing, Wuhan, Xiâ€™an, Hong Kong.
Languages: Mandarin Chinese & regional dialects; English for B2B/HCP.
